''I know he( Larry) will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly,'' Eric Schmidt said in Google blog post. Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead, he continued. As Executive Chairman, Eric Schmidt said he will focus ''wherever I can add the greatest value.'' He will also act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey.

Eric Schmidt dodges talk of becoming future Apple CEO Google chairman Eric Schmidt is sidestepping discussion of whether he might become the next Apple CEO. In the first place, it's not appropriate. Steve[ Jobs] is still the CEO and I hope he continues forever, Eric Schmidt told CNBC in a Monday interview. In response to whether or not Apple has approached him to make an offer, however, Eric Schmidt would neither confirm or deny the suggestion. ''I'm not going to

announced Thursday that co-founder Larry Page, pictured in 2007, would replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the Internet giant in April. Google said Eric Schmidt would remain with the company as executive chairman and focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. The firm's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will work on strategic projects and new products, Google said in a statement. It said the management changes would take effect on April 4.
